txt.en: 'Grimbold, is that you? I have been searching everywhere for you, and I heard a commotion!'
'It would seem that we have all been looking for each other, Grimbold.'
'Though I cannot fathom how we were so lucky as to arrive here at the same time.'
'I thank providence for this happy meeting, and our friend here.'
'I suppose I had a little something to do with it as well! But come, you must listen....'
